mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sh_menu.* FROM emp_account, emp_empposition, sh_position, sh_menu WHERE emp_account.empno = emp_empposition.empno AND RIGHT ( emp_empposition.positioncode, 10 ) = sh_position.`code` AND sh_menu.menu_id = sh_position.menu_id AND emp_account.ap_account = #{account} ORDER BY ap_account;

SELECT DISTINCT sh_menu.* FROM sh_role_resource INNER JOIN sh_menu ON sh_menu.menu_id = sh_role_resource.resource_id INNER JOIN sh_role ON sh_role.role_id = sh_role_resource.role_id WHERE role_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{roleName},'%');
SELECT * FROM sh_menu WHERE menu_id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.insert: insert into sh_menu (menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, menu_url, create_time) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
